name: R5-PlanDefinition-R4B-PlanDefinition
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 PlanDefinition into FHIR R4B

element.display: The definition of a plan for a series of actions, independent of any specific patient or context

target.display: The definition of a plan for a series of actions, independent of any specific patient or context
target.comment: R5 `PlanDefinition` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PlanDefinition`
R5 `PlanDefinition.action` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PlanDefinition.action`
R5 `PlanDefinition.action.action` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PlanDefinition.action.action`

R5 `PlanDefinition.action.cardinalityBehavior` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PlanDefinition.action.cardinalityBehavior` - cardinalityBehavior has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/action-cardinality-behavior|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/action-cardinality-behavior|4.3.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Code representing the meaning of the action or sub-actions

target.display: Code representing the meaning of the action or sub-actions
target.comment: R5 `PlanDefinition.action.code` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `PlanDefinition.action.code` - code changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *)

element.display: Whether or not the action is applicable

target.display: Whether or not the action is applicable
target.comment: R5 `PlanDefinition.action.condition` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PlanDefinition.action.condition`

R5 `PlanDefinition.action.condition.expression` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `PlanDefinition.action.condition.expression` - expression has change due to type change: R5 `expression` `Expression` maps as RelatedTo for R4B `expression`

R5 `PlanDefinition.action.condition.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `PlanDefinition.action.condition.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`
R5 `PlanDefinition.action.condition.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PlanDefinition.action.condition.id`

R5 `PlanDefinition.action.condition.kind` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PlanDefinition.action.condition.kind` - kind has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/action-condition-kind|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/action-condition-kind|4.3.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `PlanDefinition.action.condition.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `PlanDefinition.action.condition.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: Description of the activity to be performed

target.display: Description of the activity to be performed
target.comment: R5 `PlanDefinition.action.definition[x]` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `PlanDefinition.action.definition[x]` - definition[x] has change due to type change: R5 `definition[x]` `canonical` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `definition[x]`

R5 `PlanDefinition.action.description` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `PlanDefinition.action.description` - description has change due to type change: R5 description markdown has no equivalent or mapped type in R4B description

element.display: Supporting documentation for the intended performer of the action

target.display: Supporting documentation for the intended performer of the action
target.comment: R5 `PlanDefinition.action.documentation` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PlanDefinition.action.documentation`
R5 `PlanDefinition.action.dynamicValue` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PlanDefinition.action.dynamicValue`

target.display: An expression that provides the dynamic value for the customization
target.comment: R5 `PlanDefinition.action.dynamicValue.expression` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `PlanDefinition.action.dynamicValue.expression` - expression has change due to type change: R5 `expression` `Expression` maps as RelatedTo for R4B `expression`

R5 `PlanDefinition.action.dynamicValue.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `PlanDefinition.action.dynamicValue.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`
R5 `PlanDefinition.action.dynamicValue.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PlanDefinition.action.dynamicValue.id`

target.comment: R5 `PlanDefinition.action.dynamicValue.path` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PlanDefinition.action.dynamicValue.path`

R5 `PlanDefinition.action.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `PlanDefinition.action.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`
R5 `PlanDefinition.action.goalId` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PlanDefinition.action.goalId`

R5 `PlanDefinition.action.groupingBehavior` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PlanDefinition.action.groupingBehavior` - groupingBehavior has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/action-grouping-behavior|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/action-grouping-behavior|4.3.0 (Equivalent)

target.comment: R5 `PlanDefinition.action.participant.type` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `PlanDefinition.action.participant.type` - type made the element mandatory; type increased the minimum cardinality from 0 to 1; type has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/action-participant-type|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/action-participant-type|4.3.0 (Equivalent)
